Posts.EditableText: I got my health to go up and down in battle, but when i go to use a bottle of water to raise health it does nothing or i get error.
Posts.HTML: I got my health to go up and down in battle, but when i go to use a bottle of water to raise health it does nothing or i get error.

Posts.EditableText: let us see your asl and we can tell you what is wrong. Other than that we can just guess what you did wrong.
Posts.HTML: let us see your asl and we can tell you what is wrong. Other than that we can just guess what you did wrong.

Posts.EditableText: after the user types in the command to drink the water, make sure you are incrementing the health variable, and make sure the variable is numeric.
Posts.HTML: after the user types in the command to drink the water, make sure you are incrementing the health variable, and make sure the variable is numeric.
